CustomField.description: Yes = 1, No = 2, N/A = 3. N/A only appears in the "Have Required Lease" and "Have Required Rehab Budget" fields and should be disregarded.
CustomField.formula: IF ((Count_Proof_of_Deed_No__c + Count_Required_Lease_No__c + Count_Proof_of_ACQ_No__c + Count_Required_Rehab_Budget_No__c + Count_Required_Title_No__c) == 1, True, False)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What constitutes "Low Hanging Fruit" is when there is a single "No" value in the "Document Compliance" section. "N/A" values are disregarded. They only appear in the "Have Required Lease" or "Have Required Rehab Budget" field. Yes = 1, No = 2, N/A = 3.
CustomField.label: Low Hanging Fruit
